extendedInfo.description: FarePlus is a mobile app that enables GPS-based auto/cab fare calculation. The application aims to solve the problem of frequent travelers who often feel cheated because of rigged meters or frequently changing local travel fares.An app to have your travel fares calculated on your smartphone. Calculate auto, cab, taxi, and tuk-tuk fares with your local region-specific settings. Estimates day and night travel cost too. A universal travel fare calculator for all countries.So What do You Get?An app that is smart indeed. It detects you location and gets you the most updated fares for that region. It also gives you an overall summary of your journey including the starting and end points. With 2 vehicle modes and 2 time modes, this is a must have for every traveler.You can finda) Help Guide - http://www.fareplusapp.com/help/b) List of Location for which Fare settings are currently available - http://www.fareplusapp.com/help/#listofcitiesNote: The application configuration may take time due to poor GPS reception. This would happen if you are in a closed space. The problem should not persist in an open space.
